snippet: As the nation marks the 150th anniversary of his assassination, Lincoln lives on in the White House, inspiring successors but burdening them with an impossible standard to meet.
abstract: White House Memo; legacy of Pres Abraham Lincoln, whose death has reached its 150th anniversary, hangs heavily over White House and all presidents who occupy it; both Republicans and Democrats have cited Lincoln as inspiration, but standard he set is difficult to meet.
lead_paragraph: As the nation marks the 150th anniversary of his assassination, Lincoln lives on in the White House, inspiring successors but burdening them with an impossible standard to meet.

headline.print_headline: The One President All of Them Want to Be More Like
headline.main: Abraham Lincoln, the One President All of Them Want to Be More Like
